description: Video commemorating the opening of Tamayura`s art exhibition held at the Rantoukaku Museum in Kure from 26 June to 9 September 2013.

titles.title: "Tamayura no Hitokoma" Kaisai Kinen Talk Show Eizou
Tamayura One-Panel Exhibition: Opening Commemoration Talk Show Video
